name: BitDegree
programming_language: Python, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, PHP, SQL, Bootstrap, JQuery, Git
topic: Coding resources, code examples, guides, tutorials, video courses
description: A site where you can find plenty of explained code examples in different programming languages, lot of informative articles, video guides and tutorials.

name: Coursera
description: A site where they have gathered plenty of courses and programs where you can study online at some of the most well recognized schools in the world. Study for free, and pay if you want to get a certificate after completing your courses.

name: Codecademy
programming_language: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Kotlin, Swift
description: A very popular website where you can learn to code in different programming languages. You can start learning for free, but can also update to a paid subscription in order to get full access.

name: edX
programming_language: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, Python, Node, React, React Native, Bootstrap
description: A platform where you can find hundreds of courses and programs at well recognized universities and schools around the world. Join a program in data science or learn how to program with Python, it's all there.

name: Codewars
programming_language: JavaScript, C, SQL, Swift, Java, Kotlin, PHP, Perl, Python, Ruby
description: Practice and improve your skills by accepting code challenges in the programming language of your choice.

name: Udemy
programming_language: Python, Ruby, Java, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, Angular, React, React Native, Node
description: Platform with hundreds of online courses within different topics. You can study for a month or for a year, depending on which goals you strive to achieve.
